text: Gerald Haider (born 1 July 1955) was an Austrian footballer. He played for SV Austria Salzburg and VOEST Linz as striker. He played in one match for the Austria national football team. ==Career== He started playing football for Hertha Wels. His professional career started in 1974 as a striker for Austria Salzburg. For the 1978/1979 season Haider moved to VÖEST Linz. He stayed there until the end of his career in 1988. ==International== Haider played one match for the Austrian national football team on 12 June 1976. It was a 0-2 away loss versus Hungary.ÖFB Players profile ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:Players of the Austrian national football team Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian football forwards
title: Gerald Haider
